backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing a recipe database with add, filter-by-allergies, and limited-results retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing feature IDs, related files, components, and tests for recent UI and audio additions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend files including components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, favicon, and document title for Barrera Healthy Eats.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing health form input, recommendations flow, header branding, tiger accents, and soundtrack controls.
frontend/src/components/DishImage.tsx: Component that renders dish images with auto-resetting error state and a fallback placeholder on failure.
Form component capturing health data, conditions, allergies, and blood pressure with validation and async recommendation submission.
frontend/src/components/ResultsView.tsx: Displays user health input summary and a list of recommended dishes with images and nutrition data.
frontend/src/components/SoundtrackContro: Provides UI controls for playing, pausing, and adjusting volume of the app’s background music.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, login/logout, and exposing auth status via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for requesting food recommendations from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoundtrackPreferen: Manages soundtrack settings (enabled, volume, muted) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint nutrition values as readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates health form inputs including age, weight, blood pressure, and logical constraints.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current app goals, architecture notes, issues, image requirements, and implemented features for the health-focused food recommendation app.
